AbandonQuestMessage:
Abandoning a quest will reset your progress, destroy any related quest items, and close any related quest dungeons. Any abandoned quests can be picked up again.

Abandon the quest {s1}?
ot: :  quests are unavailable in your current state. This quest requires you to purchase the expansion {s1}.
:  quests are unavailable in your current state. The party is not on the same quest step.
:  quests are unavailable in your current state. This quest is in an area you do not have access to.
CampaignQuestSynced: {icon:Synced, 1.8} You are also on this step of the quest and will receive full completion credit.
CampaignQuestUnavailable: {c_red}This quest cannot be progressed while using the party's current campaign status.{/c}
DungeonQuestAlreadyCompleted: Quest cannot advance until this dungeon has reset.
DungeonResetDisabledNATooltip: Option not available until a dungeon is cleared.
DungeonResetDisabledPartyTooltip: Only the party leader can reset dungeons.
LimitedQuestCompletePrompt: No reward. You have already completed this quest or not yet eligible.
LimitedQuestNotEligible: You are not yet eligible for this quest.
ot: :  quests are those you have already completed or are not yet eligible for. You will not receive a reward for assisting.
NoQuestTracked_Controller: Open the Map & Journal {hotkey:Map} to track a quest
NoQuestTracked_KBM: Open the Journal {hotkey:QUESTS} to track a quest
QuestInBlockedZone: {c_red}This quest cannot be progressed in this version of the game.{/c}
QuestNoRewardPrompt: No reward received. You have already completed this quest or are not yet eligible.
ot: :  quests mean you are on the same step of the quest as the party. You will receive full rewards and credit on completion.
SideQuestStartMsg: This Item Starts A Side Quest
UnflippedCampQuestUnavailable: {c_red}This quest cannot be progressed while the surrounding camp is under seige.{/c}
